entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
